posts.post_content:
I am taking offers on the following card. It is tied for the highest graded of the Sweet Cap 350-460 backs and is the nicest of the three Sweet Cap backs that I have seen (three including mine). 

Note: the dog hair in the scan is on the outside of the case - I just didn't notice it in time and didn't feel like scanning it again. :D

How much for the "dog" hair? The card is nice, but I find collecting hairs on here is easier and cheaper.

I have a plan for cloning.


Free bump. :D

[quote name="xplainer" post=1452925]How much for the "dog" hair? The card is nice, but I find collecting hairs on here is easier and cheaper.

I have a plan for cloning.


Free bump. :D[/QUOTE]


:D
Bryan, good luck, nice card, very rare.

Thanks for the interest guys.

Jimmy, here is my Carolina Dog (aka American Dingo). I will send you a few hairs free of charge as it is amazing how much she sheds - I have thought about collecting it and having someone knit me a scarf.
I will probably send this one to auction shortly, so if you are interested now is the time to speak up!
